The √ærydde poynt of √æe soper. The √æryd poynt, man, haue yn mynde, How derwurly, afore hys ende, A derwur√æ ?yfte he wulde with √æe lete, Hym self al hole vn to √æy mete. A feyre sermoun he began a none, Ful of swetnes and ful of loue, Ful of cumfort to oure behoue; Of whych wurdys sum mende to make, Fyue pryncypals y √æenke to take.
